name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, GOVERNOR'S ENERGY COUNCIL, Appellant, v. AMERICAN ENERGY SERVICES, INC., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth v. American Energy Services, Inc.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, GOVERNOR’S ENERGY COUNCIL, Appellant, v. AMERICAN ENERGY SERVICES, INC., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Roger E. Clark, Harrisburg, for appellant.
C. Grainger Bowman, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
527 A.2d 531
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, GOVERNOR’S ENERGY COUNCIL, Appellant, v. AMERICAN ENERGY SERVICES, INC., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 27, 1987.
Decided July 2, 1987.
Roger E. Clark, Harrisburg, for appellant.
C. Grainger Bowman, Harrisburg, for appellee.
